title: Akrant Varshney
text:
Skills & Abilities:



Capgemini Pvt. Ltd.
Capgemini is an MNC, headquartered in Paris, France. The company has multiple offices across the globe. I have worked as a Software Engineer for Capgemini PVT. LTD. (India Location).

Worked on 3 projects, owned by the clients from UK, Canada and Australia.
Have development experience on Salesforce marketing cloud.
Involved in detail design phase, which involved reviewing the user stories.
Experience in journey Creation.
Responsible for creating personalised emails and dynamic contents using AMP Script
Created Landing pages and web forms via SFMC Cloud Pages
Worked on scheduled and file drop automations in Automation Studio
Have experience in API package creation and connecting Postman with SFMC.
Worked with SQL to make required changes in the Data Extensions.



From July 2021 to August 2023






Capgemini Pvt. Ltd.
I did my internship with the Capgemini PVT. LTD.

Did my internship in the .NET frameworks.
Completed a project provided by the Company to create a dynamic desktop application using .NET frameworks.



From January 2021 to May 2021






SmartUp
SmartUp is a tech start-up which hires students from college and teach them about web development and professionalism.

Responsible for working on-front end, using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
Guide a team of interns in the development of LearnScript, an Android application project.
LearnScript is a platform for learn how to code.
The app contains videos lectures and documentation of various coding languages.



From January 2021 to May 2021

title: Akrant Varshney
text:
Projects:

Argus
ARGUS is a website that I single-handedly developed, embodying my days of hard work in the realm of photography.

It contains the collection of clicked photos of various prime locations of India
The website was made using HTML, CSS and JS



GLOBETROTTER
Globetrotter is a web-application which automates the guide booking system

It is made using HTML, CSS and JS for front-end
Java was used for the back-end.
The application will allow the remote booking of travel guides like cab booking.
